signature: TransformedCollection<E> transformedCollection(Collection<E>, Transformer<? super E, ? extends E>)

enhanced_by.method_name: transformingCollection(Collection<E>, Transformer<? super E, ? extends E>)
enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve creating a transformed collection but differ in how they handle existing elements.
The transform method is used internally by both transformedCollection and transformingCollection to transform elements.
The transform method is used to transform individual elements, which is directly related to the output of the transformedCollection method.
The add method is used to add transformed elements to the collection, which is similar to the behavior of the transformedCollection method.
